title: Font similar to Memima
content:
Hello,   
I'm playing in a game web, and we have to look for a font's name. It's similar to Memima Alternate Bold, but it isn't.   
Do you know this font or any font similar to Memima?   
If you know, please send me an email.   
Regards,   
Maria ![handwriting](http://web.archive.org/web/20100415003354im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/38118.jpg)
author: anonymous

comments.content:
I've known this font. I've found another font similar to Memima is Edelfontmed.   
But, do you know other fonts similars to Memima?   
Thanks,   
Regards   
Maria
